audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear optimization of existing product design function. Generative design improves component efficiency within established automotive manufacturing. Pattern replicable across automotive and other manufacturing industries.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (BMW), specific quantified metric (50% weight reduction), from official BMW source. Claim is specific and measurable.
audited_claims.notes: Strong Tier 1 case - optimizes existing design processes with clear efficiency gains

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimization of manufacturing processes to reduce environmental impact. Improves existing production function through material and process efficiency. Replicable pattern for sustainable manufacturing.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific metric (25% CO2 reduction), from official source. Clear comparison baseline provided.
audited_claims.notes: Environmental optimization of existing manufacturing processes

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Cost optimization of existing battery manufacturing process. Clear efficiency improvement in established production function. Pattern applicable to other component manufacturers.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific metric (50% cost reduction), official source with clear generational comparison baseline.
audited_claims.notes: Clear cost optimization of manufacturing processes

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Product performance optimization through improved battery technology. Enhances existing product capabilities within established automotive business model. Replicable across EV manufacturers.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific metrics (30% range, 20% charging speed), official source with clear generational progression context.
audited_claims.notes: Product capability enhancement through technology optimization

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Process optimization through additive manufacturing. Improves existing production function with time efficiency gains. Pattern replicable across manufacturing.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization and official source, but lacks specific quantification of 'shortened production times'. Quality requirements mentioned but not quantified.
audited_claims.notes: Clear process optimization but metrics are vague - needs specific time reduction data

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Component design optimization achieving weight reduction. Improves existing design and manufacturing functions. Pattern replicable across automotive and aerospace industries.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific metric (50% lighter), official source with concrete example (damper component). Clear comparison baseline.
audited_claims.notes: Strong optimization case with specific component example and quantified improvement

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Development process optimization through additive manufacturing. Improves existing product development function. Pattern replicable across manufacturing industries.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization and official source, but lacks specific quantification of 'speed up development cycles' and 'faster to series maturity'. No baseline comparison provided.
audited_claims.notes: Clear process optimization intent but needs specific time reduction metrics

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Manufacturing throughput optimization demonstrating production efficiency. Shows optimization of existing manufacturing function. Pattern applicable to other high-volume manufacturers.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization, specific metric (one vehicle per minute), official source. Clear production rate benchmark despite complexity.
audited_claims.notes: Clear production efficiency metric demonstrating manufacturing optimization

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: AI optimization across multiple manufacturing functions since 2019. Improves existing production, quality, and supply chain processes. Pattern replicable across manufacturing.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization and official source with timeline context, but lacks specific quantified improvements for 'optimizing efficiency', 'elevating quality control', and 'enhancing supply chain management'.

apqc_functions.name: Plan for and align supply chain resources

audited_claims.notes: Broad AI integration claim but needs specific metrics for each optimization area

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. All claims describe optimization of existing functions (design, manufacturing, quality control, supply chain) rather than business model transformation or new revenue streams.
